trans-unit.source: Provides an interface to add and remove the event handlers for events that add, change, remove or rename components, and provides methods to raise a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged"></xref> or <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir et grensesnitt for å legge til og fjerne hendelsesbehandlingen for hendelser som legger til, endre, fjerne eller gi nytt navn til komponenter, og inneholder metoder opphøye en <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: IComponentChangeService provides an interface that can be used to indicate the methods that handle the following events: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, raised when a component is added.
trans-unit.target: IComponentChangeService gir et grensesnitt som kan brukes til å angi metoder som håndterer følgende hendelser:- <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, starter når en komponent er lagt til.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdding>, raised when a component is about to be added.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdding>, starter når en komponent som skal legges til.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdding>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>, raised when a component is changed.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>, starter når en komponent er endret.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging>, raised when a component is about to be changed.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging>, skjer når en komponent er ferd med å bli endret.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved>, raised when a component is removed.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved>, starter når en komponent er fjernet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, raised when a component is about to be removed.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, skjer når en komponent er ferd med å fjernes.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRename>, raised when a component is renamed.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRename>, starter når en komponent har fått nytt navn.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRename>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the design environment raises these component add, change, remove, or rename events.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis utformingsmiljøet i opphøyer disse komponent Legg til, endre, fjerne eller gi nytt navn til hendelser.

trans-unit.source: Designers should call the methods of this interface when using <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction> objects to provide undo and redo functionality for design-time actions that affect components.
trans-unit.target: Utviklere må kalle metoder på dette grensesnittet ved <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>objekter til å tilby angre og angre funksjonalitet for utforming handlinger som påvirker komponenter.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>

trans-unit.source: More information is available in the documentation for <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes mer informasjon i dokumentasjonen for <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>

trans-unit.source: Generally, only the root designer handles these change notifications.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis bare roten designer håndterer disse endringsforespørsler.

trans-unit.source: This service also provides methods that raise a component changed event or component changing event.
trans-unit.target: Denne tjenesten også inneholder metoder som legger en komponent som er endret hendelse eller endre hendelse-komponenten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> or a component can indicate that a component has changed or is changing with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.OnComponentChanged%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.OnComponentChanging%2A> methods, respectively.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>eller en komponent kan tyde på at en komponent er endret eller endrer med den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.OnComponentChanged%2A>og <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.OnComponentChanging%2A>metoder, henholdsvis.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.OnComponentChanging%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.OnComponentChanged%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a component has been added.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en komponent er lagt til.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs during load and when new components are created by the user, after the component has been sited.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår under innlasting og når nye komponenter opprettes av brukeren, etter at komponenten er plassert.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a component is in the process of being added.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en komponent er i ferd med å som legges til.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs during load and when the user creates a new component.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår under innlasting og når brukeren oppretter en ny komponent.

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the process of adding a component by throwing an exception here.
trans-unit.target: Du kan avbryte prosessen med å legge til en komponent med et unntak her.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a component has been changed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en komponent er endret.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any component on the form changes.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når en komponent i skjemaet endres.

trans-unit.source: This event will not occur during form load and unload, because changes are expected at this time.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen vil ikke oppstår under innlasting av skjemaet og Last opp, fordi endringer forventes på dette tidspunktet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction> can raise multiple ComponentChanged events.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > En <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>kan øke flere ComponentChanged hendelser.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>

trans-unit.source: Some ComponentChanged event handlers can interfere with expected sequences of events, such as if your code alters the values of properties while a transaction is occurring.
trans-unit.target: Del ComponentChanged hendelsesbehandling kan påvirke med forventede sekvenser av hendelser, for eksempel hvis koden endrer verdier for egenskapene når en transaksjon pågår.

trans-unit.source: A ComponentChanged event handler can also impair performance if it draws after each change while a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction> is in progress.
trans-unit.target: En ComponentChanged hendelsesbehandling kan også redusere ytelsen hvis den tegner etter hver endring under en <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>pågår.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>

trans-unit.source: In order to allow a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction> in process to complete without interruption or interference by your ComponentChanged event handler, you can test the state of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.InTransaction%2A> property, and defer handling the change events until the completion of the transaction by adding a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventHandler> which will raise your ComponentChanged event handler and remove itself upon completion of the transaction.
trans-unit.target: For å tillate en <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>i prosessen er fullført uten forstyrrelser eller forstyrrelser av hendelsesbehandlingen ComponentChanged, kan du teste tilstanden til den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.InTransaction%2A>egenskapen og utsette behandling av hendelser for endringsforespørsel før fullføring av transaksjonen ved å legge til en <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventHandler>som vil utløse ComponentChanged hendelsesbehandlingen og fjerne seg selv når transaksjonen er fullført.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventHandler> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.InTransaction%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a component is in the process of being changed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en komponent er i ferd med å bli endret.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs before the component is actually changed, and gives the designer a chance to abort the change or perform any pre-change processing.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår før komponenten faktisk endres, og gir designer mulighet til å avbryte endringen eller utføre noen før endringen-behandling.

trans-unit.source: This event does not occur during form load and unload, because changes are expected at this time.
trans-unit.target: Ikke denne hendelsen oppstår under innlasting av skjemaet og Last opp, fordi endringer forventes på dette tidspunktet.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a component has been removed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en komponent er fjernet.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs during unload and when a component is deleted by the user.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår under utlasting og når en komponent slettes av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The event occurs before the site has been removed from the component.
trans-unit.target: Inntreffer før området har blitt fjernet fra komponenten.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a component is in the process of being removed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en komponent er i ferd med å fjernes.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs during unload and when the user deletes a component.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår under utlasting og når brukeren sletter en komponent.

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the process of removing a component by throwing an exception here.
trans-unit.target: Du kan avbryte prosessen med å fjerne en komponent med et unntak her.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a component is renamed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en komponent har fått nytt navn.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs after the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event when a component has been renamed.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår etter den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>-hendelse når en komponent har fått nytt navn.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Announces to the component change service that a particular component has changed.
trans-unit.target: Annonserer til komponenten endre tjenesten at en bestemt komponent er endret.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden opphøyer den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>hendelsen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>

trans-unit.source: Most designers that ship with the [!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/add/includes/winsdklong-md.md)], as well as the Visual Studio design-time environment, typically raise this event for you when a component in a project is changed, so most of the time you do not need to explicitly call this method.
trans-unit.target: De fleste utviklere som følger med den [!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/add/includes/winsdklong-md.md)], i tillegg til Visual Studio utformingen-miljøet vanligvis hever denne hendelsen for deg når en komponent i et prosjekt endres, slik at du ikke trenger å eksplisitt oftest kalle denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: The appropriate <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> events are automatically raised when a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> is used to change a property value or components are added or removed from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> container.
trans-unit.target: Riktig <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>hendelser blir automatisk aktiveres når en <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>brukes til å endre en egenskap verdien eller komponenter legges til eller fjernet fra den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>beholder.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>

trans-unit.source: Before calling OnComponentChanged, first call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.OnComponentChanging%2A> to indicate that a component is about to change, and make the change.
trans-unit.target: Før du kaller OnComponentChanged, første kall <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.OnComponentChanging%2A>som viser at en komponent er i ferd med å endre og gjøre endringen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.OnComponentChanging%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then call OnComponentChanged to raise the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Kall OnComponentChanged opphøye den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>hendelsen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>

trans-unit.source: The component that has changed.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten er endret.

trans-unit.source: The member that has changed.
trans-unit.target: Medlemmet som er endret.

trans-unit.source: This is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if this change is not related to a single member.
trans-unit.target: Dette er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis denne endringen ikke er relatert til ett medlem.

trans-unit.source: The old value of the member.
trans-unit.target: Den gamle verdien for medlemmet.

trans-unit.source: This is valid only if the member is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Dette er bare gyldig hvis medlemmet ikke er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the member.
trans-unit.target: Den nye verdien for medlemmet.

trans-unit.source: This is valid only if the member is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Dette er bare gyldig hvis medlemmet ikke er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Announces to the component change service that a particular component is changing.
trans-unit.target: Annonserer til komponenten endre tjenesten en bestemt komponent endres.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging> event.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden opphøyer den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging>hendelsen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging>

trans-unit.source: Most designers included with the [!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/add/includes/winsdklong-md.md)], as well as the Visual Studio design-time environment, typically raise this event automatically; so most of the time, you do not need to explicitly call this method.
trans-unit.target: De fleste utviklere som er inkludert i den [!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/add/includes/winsdklong-md.md)], i tillegg til Visual Studio utformingen-miljøet vanligvis hever denne hendelsen automatisk; derfor vanligvis, trenger du ikke vil kalle denne metoden eksplisitt.

trans-unit.source: The appropriate <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> events are automatically raised when a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> is used to change a property value or components are added or removed from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> container.
trans-unit.target: Riktig <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>hendelser blir automatisk aktiveres når en <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>brukes til å endre en egenskap verdien eller komponenter legges til eller fjernet fra den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>beholder.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>

trans-unit.source: The component that is about to change.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten som er i ferd med å endre.

trans-unit.source: The member that is changing.
trans-unit.target: Medlemmet som endres.

trans-unit.source: This is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if this change is not related to a single member.
trans-unit.target: Dette er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis denne endringen ikke er relatert til ett medlem.
